question: You recently stayed with a childhood friend for a few days.Write a letter to this friend. In your letter:Thank your friend for letting you stay with them.refer to something enjoyable that you did while staying with him/herinvite your friend to visit you
text: I hope you and your family are fine. I am really sorry that I couldn't write to you any sooner because of some urgency at work.

First of all, I am writing this letter to thank you personally for letting me stay at your place for 5 days. Without a doubt, I have made some great memories travelling, exploring your city, New Delhi, and spending some high-quality time with you and your family.

What's more memorable is that your mom cooked a roasted spicy chicken for both of us to celebrate my 28th Birthday in style and then we watched the movie on your big screen, which I desperately wanted to see for ages, "The Avengers". Certainly, this was one of the best birthdays of my life all thanks to you.
Anyway, I would like to invite you over to my place on the occasion of Thanks Giving, which is next month. What's more, I have asked a few common friends of ours to join us if they can.
I look forward to your response on this.
